io.scanbot.sdk.process

Class PageProcessor

  • io.scanbot.sdk.process.PageProcessor

  • public class PageProcessor

    Performs processing operation on class Page

    See Also:
    class Page

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PageProcessor(NonExistentClass context, PageFileStorage pageFileStorage)
      Performs processing operation on class Page

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Page applyFilter(Page page, ImageFilterType filter)
      Applies an image filter on given page based on the existing unfiltered document image. The filtered image result will be stored as document image of the page. The current document image of the page will be overwritten. The original image of the page will not be modified.
      Page cropAndRotate(Page page, int times, java.util.List<? extends error.NonExistentClass> polygon)
      Crops the polygon from the original image and rotates all images (and previews) of the given page x times. The original image is required, other images (document, unfiltered document) are optional. The direction of rotation is counterclockwise if the times value is positive and clockwise if times value is negative (e.g. -2 = rotates 2 times to the right).
      Page detectDocument(Page page)
      Performs document detection on the original image of given page. The page must have the original image. Creates and stored the document (cropped) image file based on document detection result (polygon) and optionally defined filter in the page object.
      NonExistentClass generateFilteredPreview(Page page, ImageFilterType filter)
      Generates filtered preview image based on the unfiltered document preview image and caches it in the file system.
      Page rotate(Page page, int times)
      Rotates all images (and previews) of the given page x times. The original image is required, other images (document, unfiltered document) are optional. The direction of rotation is counterclockwise if the times value is positive and clockwise if times value is negative (e.g. -2 = rotates 2 times to the right).

    • Constructor Detail

      • PageProcessor

        public PageProcessor(NonExistentClass context,
                     PageFileStorage pageFileStorage)

        Performs processing operation on class Page

        See Also:
        class Page

    • Method Detail

      • applyFilter

        public Page applyFilter(Page page,
                        ImageFilterType filter)

        Applies an image filter on given page based on the existing unfiltered document image. The filtered image result will be stored as document image of the page. The current document image of the page will be overwritten. The original image of the page will not be modified.

        Parameters:
        page - Existing page with unfiltered document image.
        filter - Supported filter type.
        Returns:
        New class Page instance with updated Page.filter field.
        Throws:
        - If the unfiltered document image does not exists for class Page.
        See Also:
        enum ImageFilterType

      • generateFilteredPreview

        public NonExistentClass generateFilteredPreview(Page page,
                                                ImageFilterType filter)

        Generates filtered preview image based on the unfiltered document preview image and caches it in the file system.

        Parameters:
        page - Existing page with unfiltered document image.
        filter - Supported filter type.
        Returns:
        Generated filtered preview Bitmap.
        Throws:
        - If the unfiltered document image does not exists for class Page.
        See Also:
        enum ImageFilterType

      • detectDocument

        public Page detectDocument(Page page)

        Performs document detection on the original image of given page. The page must have the original image. Creates and stored the document (cropped) image file based on document detection result (polygon) and optionally defined filter in the page object.

        Parameters:
        page - Existing page with original image.
        Returns:
        New class Page instance with updated fields Page.polygon and Page.detectionStatus
        Throws:
        - If the original image does not exists for class Page

      • rotate

        public Page rotate(Page page,
                   int times)

        Rotates all images (and previews) of the given page x times. The original image is required, other images (document, unfiltered document) are optional. The direction of rotation is counterclockwise if the times value is positive and clockwise if times value is negative (e.g. -2 = rotates 2 times to the right).

        Parameters:
        page - Existing page with at least the original image.
        times - Rotate x times
        Returns:
        new class Page instance with the rotated Page.polygon field
        Throws:
        - If the original image does not exists for class Page

      • cropAndRotate

        public Page cropAndRotate(Page page,
                          int times,
                          java.util.List<? extends error.NonExistentClass> polygon)

        Crops the polygon from the original image and rotates all images (and previews) of the given page x times. The original image is required, other images (document, unfiltered document) are optional. The direction of rotation is counterclockwise if the times value is positive and clockwise if times value is negative (e.g. -2 = rotates 2 times to the right).

        Parameters:
        page - Existing page with at least the original image.
        times - Rotate x times
        polygon - Polygon to crop
        Returns:
        new class Page instance with the rotated Page.polygon field
        Throws:
        - If the original image does not exists for class Page
